[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”0″ enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Down” bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1597053743325{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/home-background-yellow.png?id=8945) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

Detection & Response Get managed detection and response for real-time, ongoing protection of your entire IT estate and operations. Find Out More “I need a supplier
that understands the importance of implementing and maintaining Information Security.” Uncover critical vulnerabilities in your environment with our CREST-certified penetration testing methodology. Find Out More Penetration Testing “As a security manager
I know the benefit of carrying out simulated cyber attacks on our systems.” Empower your staff to recognise and defend against cyber-attacks with our range of training and advisory services. Find Out More Awareness Training “I need a company
that can deliver cutting-edge training to my staff.” 24/7 ongoing monitoring to hunt for and eradicate threats across your environment and endpoints. Find Out More Managed Detection & Response “My job is to ensure that our business is protected against cyber security attacks. I need a company that can hunt for and eradicate threats.” Our Partners Enhance your portfolio with our suite of enterprise-class cybersecurity services. Find Out More "I need a trusted partner that can provide additional security services into my portfolio."
[/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Down” css=”.vc_custom_1597060613844{margin-top: -80px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;padding-right: 12px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 12px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:-300px|margin_right_large:100px|margin_left_large:100px|padding_top_large:60px|padding_right_large:50px|padding_bottom_large:60px|padding_left_large:50px|margin_top_medium:-250px|margin_right_medium:50px|margin_left_medium:50px|padding_top_medium:30px|padding_right_medium:25px|padding_bottom_medium:30px|padding_left_medium:25px|margin_top_small:-150px|margin_right_small:50px|margin_left_small:50px|padding_top_small:30px|padding_right_small:25px|padding_bottom_small:30px|padding_left_small:25px”]

What we do

  • Test
  • Detect & Respond
  • Advise

[vc_row_inner gap=”10″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:65px” el_id=”homepage-tabs”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Penetration Testing

Test the security of your environment and network

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Ethical Phishing

Identify the cybersecurity weaknesses in your organisation

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Red Teaming

Find out how well your organisation will hold up against a real-world attack

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[vc_row_inner gap=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1601902343166{margin-top: 65px !important;}” el_id=”homepage-tabs2″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Managed Detection & Response

On-going analysis of the cybersecurity of your entire environment

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Managed Endpoint Detection & Response

Protect your endpoints (devices) against all types of cyber-attacks

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Incident Response

Damage control in case your organisation does suffer a security breach

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[vc_row_inner enable_content_animation=”yes” gap=”10″ ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1601893345623{margin-top: 65px !important;}” ca_duration=”1000″ ca_delay=”180″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-3″]

Awareness Training

Reduce the likelihood of data breaches by training your staff to recognise attacks

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-3″]

Cyber Essentials & Cyber Essential [Plus]

Audit your internal IT security so you can start with a strong cybersecurity foundation

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-3″]

Threat & Risk Assessment

Refine your cybersecurity strategy by identifying key assets and the threats they face

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-3″]

Cyber Advice and Guidance

Get expert advice on how to best fill the gaps in your organisation’s cyber-defence

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1600435049633{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/home-who-we-are.jpg?id=8914) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”who-we-are”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_left_medium:10%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1600435353512{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

Who we are

We are cybersecurity experts who can help you identify areas of cyber-risk and help you manage them.

Find out more Meet the team [vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-xs-6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-xs-6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1600443128096{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”o2c-home-page-blog”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-md-6″ ca_duration=”1800″ ca_delay=”180″ ca_init_translate_y=”35″]

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″ responsive_align=”text-md-right”] View all [/vc_column][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1598003040075{padding-top: 20px !important;}” el_id=”homepage-blog”]

Developing Partnership to Provide Managed Endpoint Detection and Response (M-EDR)

3 weeks ago

Falanx Cyber Appoints Tech Entrepreneur to Launch Innovation and Growth Division

1 month ago

Live on BBC Newsday – US says Russian cyber attacks may increase in response to Western sanctions

US indicates increase in Russian cyber attacks, UK businesses need to be ready

2 months ago
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601380925093{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″ css=”.vc_custom_1600435813515{padding-left: 3% !important;}”]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement with Adam through to test reports and follow up advice they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager Adam and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“The staff awareness training session was extremely valuable and Rob did an excellent job in presenting clear, concise and not too technical information for our employees to understand. We will definitely consider an annual training session going forward.”

Mark Winward
Head Of Technical Services, Arc Legal Assistance

“I have always been impressed by the professionalism and depth of knowledge of the Falanx team. They have a strong focus on our needs as their customer when planning, executing and reviewing the results of our security tests.  They also work hard to understand our business risk perspective and suggest appropriate treatments for any findings arising from tests.”

Peter Taylor
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” bg_position=”right bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1600438294441{margin-top: 110px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}” responsive_css=”margin_top_large:110px|margin_right_large:30px|padding_top_small:0px|padding_bottom_small:0px” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″][vc_column enable_column_shadowbox=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1586948588052{margin-top: -150px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” column_box_shadow=”%5B%7B%22x_offset%22%3A%220%22%2C%22y_offset%22%3A%2255px%22%2C%22blur_radius%22%3A%2270px%22%2C%22shadow_color%22%3A%22rgba(0%2C%200%2C%200%2C%200.075)%22%7D%5D”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-1/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1600435583310{margin-right: -30px !important;margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/contact-form-home.jpg?id=8918) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” responsive_css=”margin_left_large:-50px|padding_top_large:30px|padding_left_small:0px”][vc_single_image image=”4068″ img_size=”full” invisible=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1586948383327{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Contact-us-image.png?id=7904) !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-md-8 vc_col-xs-4/5″ css=”.vc_custom_1600435557264{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}” responsive_css=”padding_right_medium:45px|padding_left_medium:15px”]

Contact us

    We respect your privacy and do not tolerate spam and will never sell, rent, lease or give away your information to any third party.

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
